name: Rural America Onshore Sourcing
overview:
Rural America Onshore Sourcing, Inc., with State Headquarters and Business Development Centers in Wisconsin, Ohio and Kentucky, is a USA owned and operated USA leading Onshoring company. We make it simple, secure, and profitable for companies of all sizes to outsource even their most challenging projects. Onshore means Rural America employs professionals from within rural America, not from overseas. Rural America provides business process outsourcing services using lower cost rural based professionals so that Companies don’t have to send projects offshore or use expensive urban vendors. A minority owned company, Rural America enables customers to cut their project and labor costs by up to 40%. Rural America’s hourly rates are more affordable than the overall cost of using India, China, or East European outsourcing when the hidden costs of communication barriers, travel expenses, and quality control issues are added to the labor costs. Our strategic objectives include leveraging our scalable pool of professional workforce to provide a wide variety of services which can be provided to our client base.

Corporate Mission Rural America is dedicated to exceeding customer expectations by providing services that solve un-met customer needs. Driven by a combination of exceptional customer service, technical prowess, and operational excellence the Company willdeliver consistent growth and increasing shareholder value. Rural America achieves this corporate mission by: leveraging strong research and development capabilities to increase the spectrum of potential applications and the sell-in of Rural Americaâ€™s services offering significant revenue potential; implementing stringent development and finished product quality standards to ensure on-time delivery of the highest quality services; building upon a â€œtotal valueâ€ proposition that exceeds customersâ€™ expectations and strengthens long-lasting strategic relationships; generating technology awareness, high performance image, and brand insistence; managing a market awareness campaign that leads to market acceptance and increasing service sell-in and revenue growth; executing operational excellence to manage down COGS thus increasing overall profitability.
